== CAscript ==

=== Using CAscript ===


{{{
USAGE: cascript [OPTIONS] <project directory>
OPTIONS
	-h,--help    	Show this usage screen.
	   --url     	Download and create project directory from URL.
	   --video   	Force video mode.
	   --sampling	Set sampling rate when we sample frames as previews
	-v           	Verbose mode.
}}}




=== Default parameters for CAscript ===

{{{
samplingRate = 10

default_ffmpeg_args = '-t 300 -sameq'
default_line_args = '--preset high'
default_shot_args = ''
default_color_args = '-q 2'

supportedMovieType = ['mpeg','mpg','avi','mov','m4v','mp4']
supportedImageType = ['jpg','jpeg','png','tif','tiff','bmp']
}}}
